snippet.title: 12 Th Trailer movie of Episode 3: "The Closure"
snippet.description:
This is the 12 Th trailer of the Half Life 2, episode 2 SPmod called'
 Episode 3: "The Closure"
Everything shown in this new trailer is recorded from playing level 18 of this 21 levels SPmod. Please keep in mind that most weapons are still place holders and there fore the final mod will have other custom made weapons. Everything is still WIP and can there fore be different from what will be seen in the final mod.

Have fun watching, and should you want to see more movies and or screenshots, or read more info about this mod then please check it's Moddb page here;
http://www.moddb.com/mods/the-closure/news/12th-massive-update

thanks for watching,
Leon (SPYmaps)
